values.code: computeBoundingSphere(positions: FloatArray!, positionsOffset: Int, positionsCount: Int, sphere: FloatArray!, sphereOffset: Int)
values.desc: Compute a bounding sphere for a set of points.

values.code: frustumCullSpheres(mvp: FloatArray!, mvpOffset: Int, spheres: FloatArray!, spheresOffset: Int, spheresCount: Int, results: IntArray!, resultsOffset: Int, resultsCapacity: Int)
values.desc: Given an OpenGL ES ModelView-Projection matrix (which implicitly describes a frustum) and a list of spheres, determine which spheres intersect the frustum.

values.code: visibilityTest(ws: FloatArray!, wsOffset: Int, positions: FloatArray!, positionsOffset: Int, indices: CharArray!, indicesOffset: Int, indexCount: Int)
values.desc: Test whether a given triangle mesh is visible on the screen.
